about_the_game:
Commander, place your colony and build your army to take back the Earth! Join players from all over the world and fight in real-time for global conquest and domination.

Battle Dawn 2: Terra Reborn is the long-anticipated sequel to Battle Dawn, one of the most popular and challenging strategy MMOs on the web. It is a unique real-time strategy war game spanning anywhere from days to weeks for every round (harvest), where diplomacy and teamwork are the key to success. Team up with other skilled Commanders and forge the greatest alliance to conquer the earth. Unleash the full force of your army and fight over crucial resources. Use brilliant strategies and combat tactics to occupy foreign territory and crush your enemies. Use spies to weaken and trap your opponents' armies for devastating results.

Features

  • Create or join an alliance to conquer the globe together and build friendships that will last a lifetime
  • Cutthroat strategy and diplomacy leading to epic surprise attacks and heart wrenching betrayals
  • Train and combine 28 different types of units to build the perfect army for the battlefield
  • Build your colony strategically for maximum advantage, using turrets, ion cannons and many other buildings to get an edge over other players
  • Place outposts and take control of the map with nuclear missiles, teleport gates, radars and training bases
  • Use your Avatar to lead your army and equip it with items for devastating effects, earn mythical items in battle and change the rules of war!
  • Take advantage of the in-game summer season for devastating assaults, use the winter season to prepare and grow. Seasons last a few days and provide various bonuses in game
  • Use spies to sabotage enemy resources, disable enemy structures, weaken troops or stop them from moving (or both at the same time!) to force devastating losses onto those who would oppose you
  • ...and much more!


Battle Dawn 2 enjoys updates based on feedback, please don't forget to let us know what you'd like to see next!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450 (Intel HD 4000 / Vega 3)
  • Storage: 1300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (Intel Iris Graphics / Vega 8)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Place your colony, find an alliance of like-minded players and triumph over thousands of other players to conquer the world through strategy, tactics, diplomacy and skill in the biggest social-interaction based MMO of all time. Upgrade your colony, collect items for your Avatar and become a legend!
